alert.note: Alert for Western Strait of Juan De Fuca (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:58PM PST until January 18 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected on Thursday. Total snow accumulations of up to three inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Western Strait of Juan de Fuca lowlands, including Sekiu, Clallam Bay, and Joyce. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain and snow showers will linger into this evening, but less than a half an inch of additional snow accumulation is expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Western Strait of Juan De Fuca
